title: CUSAT Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Assistant professor Post
description: Cochin University of Science and Technology (CUSAT) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Assistant Professor Jobs. Those candidates with M.E/ M.Tech, M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the CUSAT Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age Limit, selection Process, and salary structure. education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the last date of application. If you are lo...
